import React, { useEffect, useState, ChangeEvent } from 'react' import './styles.css' import logo from '../../assets/logo.svg' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { FiArrowLeft } from 'react-icons/fi' import { Map, TileLayer, Marker, Popup } from 'react-leaflet' import api from '../../services/api' import axios from 'axios' interface Items { id: number title: string url: string } interface ufResponse { sigla: string } const CreatePoint = () => { const [items, setItems] = useState([]) const [ufs, setUf] = useState([]) const [selectedUf, setSelectedUf] = useState('0') function hendleSelectUf(event: ChangeEvent){ const selectedUf = event.target.value setSelectedUf(selectedUf) } useEffect(() => { api.get('/items').then(response => { setItems(response.data) }) }, []) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('https://servicodados.ibge.gov.br/api/v1/localidades/estados').then(response =>{ const ufInitials = response.data.map(uf => uf.sigla) setUf(ufInitials) }) },[]) useEffect(() => { axios.get('https://servicodados.ibge.gov.br/api/v1/localidades/estados/mg/distritos').then(response => { }) }, []) return (
